reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were VERY helpful and hard working. Food good. Room clean and well cared for tho air conditioning was sometimes inadequate. Fabulous view of the bay and Vesuvius (worth paying a supplement) nice pool area and restaurant. Would be better if free shuttle service ran pm but service bus stopped at the hotel too.
reviews.title: Super Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed 3 days with my wife in this hotel, and my only regret was not spending more days there. The rooms are very clean, beautifull and confortable, the view from the hotel (Located in a hill) in one of the most beautiful of the entire region, the atendents are very kind and helpfull.Its quite far from city town what is not a problem if you are by car, if you aren´t, there is a free shuttle service that works very well, every hour until 11:00 PM . Although it´s classified as 3 stars, for sure its level is 4 stars hotel, they need only to put minibars in the rooms .
reviews.title: Best option in Sorrento if you are by car

likes.disliked: — no minibar in room (Not a big problem as the bar still open all night)

reviews.title: Great, value for money hotel
reviews.text: We spent two wonderful weeks in Sorrento, Italy. Our stay at the Hotel Vue D'Or helped to make this holiday so enjoyable. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Thankfully it isn't a great big Hotel and even the guests were friendly and chatted at meal times.

The Hotel provides a shuttle bus into Sorrento - this was our only complaint as it finished at 12.30 noon and didn't run again until 5.30 pm. The local buses (SITA) run past the Hotel though and only cost 2 euros pp - these run throughout the day. You can walk from the Hotel down into Sorrento (30 minutes) - walking shoes recommended - not suitable for those with any mobility problems and maybe small children. Coming back up this walk in the heat is a killer and we preferred to get the bus.
reviews.title: Fantastic view !!!!!

likes.disliked: — It's a none smokinghotel, but that is my problem !!! and not the hotel's problem

reviews.text: You can also walk into St Agata (20 minutes) which is a small but very Italian little town.
reviews.title: We Love it, Hotel very good with fabulous views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel toward the end of out Italy trip thsi past summer. We were coming from Positano and it was just a short bus ride and walk downhill from the actual stop. The hotel is located in the hills of Sorrento and not actually in the city center. There is a free shuttle that leaves from the front of the hotel multiple times daily and although they tell you its a 20 minute walk down it took us about an hour and a half... we may have taken a wrong turn but Italy time is a little longer... The hotel was clean and the rooms have little balconys overlooking the pool and sorrentos hills which are beautiful. The staff spoke great english and we among some of the most interesting characters I have ever met. The hotel had a snack bar with drinks and gelato that was open late every night. The owners had their very tempermental dog Billy hanging around every day which was cute and the bus driver was very helpful and took great care of us. The bartenders were very comical and friendly as well. I would most defintely stay at this hotel again. If you are taking the late shuttle back be careful because it is not large and could not fit all of the people so multiple trips had to be taken. The towels in the bathroom were the thin Italian style that do not dry you well so if you have the room bring a towel of your own.Sorrento is a wonderful and magical place and I can not wait to go back
reviews.title: Interesting and fun hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is possible to walk into sorretno but it is a very steep walk so not suitable for anyone with mobility problems. There is also a lovely walk up to hill to St Agata a very nice small town, Again this is a steep walk but much shorter than the walk into sorrento. The hotel staff will provide a map and directions for the walks.
reviews.title: Superb Hotel and location in th hills

likes.disliked: — evening meal - but that was optional

reviews.title: I wish I could rate this higher
reviews.text: We have just returned from a fantastic stay at La Vue D'or with our two young daughters who are under 4.

reviews.title: turned out nice again
reviews.text: we have stayed at the hotel twice,once for seven nights returning the year after for 14 nights,the hotel is family run and is very efficent form the time you book in to the sad time of leaving.the hotel is based approx 6km away from the town centre,but do not worry as the hotel runs a free shuttle bus 4 times through out the day to the town centre.
the rooms we stayed in were clean with shower facilities ,twin bed and on the 2nd stay we had a balcony, i had the belief that if you booked privately you had better rooms with better views.
